mapper.select: SELECT NO , NAME FROM FAQ_CATEGORY

SELECT F.NO AS NO , C.NAME AS FAQ_CNAME , F.QUESTION AS QUESTION , A.NAME AS WRITER_NAME , TO_CHAR(F.ENROLL_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS ENROLL_DATE , F.HIT AS HIT FROM FAQ F JOIN FAQ_CATEGORY C ON F.FAQ_CNO = C.NO JOIN ADMIN A ON A.NO = F.WRITER_NO WHERE F.STATUS = 'N'
AND C.NO = #{searchType}
AND F.QUESTION LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
ORDER BY F.ENROLL_DATE DESC
SELECT NO , QUESTION , ANSWER FROM FAQ WHERE NO = #{fno} AND STATUS = 'N'
SELECT NO , NAME FROM QNA_CATEGORY

SELECT Q.NO AS NO , Q.TITLE AS TITLE , C.NAME AS QNA_CNAME , TO_CHAR(Q.ENROLL_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS ENROLL_DATE , Q.ANSWER_YN FROM QNA Q JOIN QNA_CATEGORY C ON Q.QNA_CNO = C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON Q.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE M.NO = #{no} ORDER BY Q.ENROLL_DATE DESC
SELECT Q.NO, Q.TITLE, Q.CONTENT, Q.ANSWER FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON Q.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE Q.NO = #{no} AND M.NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT NO , NAME FROM REPORT_CATEGORY

SELECT NO , NAME , DONG_NUM , HO_NUM , PROFILE FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
AND NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND PHONE LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
SELECT NO , NAME , PROFILE FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND NO = #{mno}

SELECT R.NO , R.TITLE , TO_CHAR(R.ENROLL_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS ENROLL_DATE , C.NAME AS REPORT_CNAME , R.ANSWER_DATE FROM REPORT R JOIN REPORT_CATEGORY C ON R.REPORT_CNO = C.NO WHERE R.REPORTER = #{no} ORDER BY R.ENROLL_DATE DESC
SELECT R.NO ,R.TITLE ,R.CONTENT ,R.ANSWER_DATE ,M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME ,M.PROFILE AS MEMBER_PROFILE FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.RESPONDENT = M.NO WHERE R.NO = #{no} AND R.REPORTER = #{reporter}

SELECT Q.ANSWER_YN FROM QNA Q JOIN QNA_CATEGORY C ON Q.QNA_CNO = C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON Q.MEMBER_NO = M.NO
AND Q.TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND M.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND Q.ENROLL_DATE BETWEEN '${startDate}' AND '${endDate}'
AND Q.QNA_CNO = #{qnaCno}

SELECT Q.NO , C.NAME AS QNACNAME , Q.TITLE , M.NAME AS MEMBERNAME , TO_CHAR(Q.ENROLL_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS ENROLL_DATE , TO_CHAR(Q.ANSWER_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS ANSWER_DATE , Q.ANSWER_YN FROM QNA Q JOIN QNA_CATEGORY C ON Q.QNA_CNO = C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON Q.MEMBER_NO = M.NO
AND Q.TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND M.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND Q.ENROLL_DATE BETWEEN '${startDate}' AND '${endDate}'
AND Q.ANSWER_YN = #{answerYn}
AND Q.QNA_CNO = #{qnaCno}
ORDER BY Q.ENROLL_DATE DESC
SELECT Q.NO , Q.TITLE , Q.CONTENT , Q.ANSWER , Q.ANSWER_YN , M.NO AS MEMBER_NO , M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME , M.PROFILE AS MEMBER_PROFILE FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON Q.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE Q.NO = #{qno}

SELECT R.ANSWER_YN FROM REPORT R JOIN REPORT_CATEGORY C ON R.REPORT_CNO = C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON R.REPORTER = M.NO
AND R.TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND M.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND R.ENROLL_DATE BETWEEN '${startDate}' AND '${endDate}'
AND R.REPORT_CNO = #{reportCno}

SELECT R.NO , C.NAME AS REPORTCNAME , R.TITLE , M.NAME AS REPORTER , TO_CHAR(R.ENROLL_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS ENROLL_DATE , TO_CHAR(R.ANSWER_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS ANSWER_DATE , R.ANSWER_YN FROM REPORT R JOIN REPORT_CATEGORY C ON R.REPORT_CNO = C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON R.REPORTER = M.NO
AND R.TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND M.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND R.ENROLL_DATE BETWEEN '${startDate}' AND '${endDate}'
AND R.ANSWER_YN = #{answerYn}
AND R.REPORT_CNO = #{reportCno}
ORDER BY R.ENROLL_DATE DESC

SELECT R.NO , R.TITLE , R.CONTENT , R.ANSWER_YN , M.NO AS RESPONDENT , M.NAME AS RESPONDENT_NAME , M.PROFILE AS RESPONDENT_PROFILE FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.RESPONDENT = M.NO WHERE R.NO = #{rno}
